Package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage

Interface SharedPassage

All Superinterfaces:
Heccable, Parseable
All Known Subinterfaces:
PassageEditingInterface, PassageReadingInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditablePassage
public interface SharedPassage
extends Parseable, Heccable

  • Method Details

    • doesPassageContentContainDeletedLinks

      static boolean doesPassageContentContainDeletedLinks​(java.lang.String content)
      Checks if given content contains a link to a now-deleted passage.
      Parameters:
      content - the content to check
      Returns:
      true if it contains a link to a now-deleted passage. false otherwise.

    • actuallyPutValidTagListStringIntoArrayList

      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> actuallyPutValidTagListStringIntoArrayList​(java.lang.String validTagListString)
      Actually puts the valid tag list string into an ArrayList
      Parameters:
      validTagListString - the valid tag list string that's being put into the ArrayList (space delimited)
      Returns:
      an ArrayList holding the tag names that the given validTagListString held

    • findLinks

      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> findLinks​(java.lang.String rawContent)
      A wrapper method for actuallyParseThePassageLinks
      Parameters:
      rawContent - the raw passage content with the links that are being looked for
      Returns:
      the set with all the names of the passage links

    • actuallyParseThePassageLinks

      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> actuallyParseThePassageLinks​(java.lang.String input, boolean direct)
      A method that finds passage links in the unparsed content
      Parameters:
      input - the input passage text to parse
      direct - whether or not it's looking for direct passage links
      Returns:
      the input passage text with the links converted into hecc links
